sentence.Network_en: GATT member countries have largely agreed to replace expensive and inefficient protectionist policies with a competitive free market system for world trade.
sentence.Network_cn: 关贸总协定的成员国已大体上同意在全球贸易中用竞争性的自由市场体制取代代价高且效率低的保护主义政策。

sentence.Network_en: Traditionally supporters of liberal trade policies, labor has become increasingly protectionist.
sentence.Network_cn: 从传统上说, 美国劳工一向是自由贸易政策的支持者.现在他们已变得日益具有保护主义色彩了.

sentence.Network_en: Some of the most energetic protectionist measures are erected against agricultural products in all countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一些最厉害的保护主义措施,用来反对一切国家的农产品.

PerfectNetExp.abs: He stoutly defends free trade to protectionist audiences ., 他坚决支持自由贸易 , 反对贸易保护主义听众.
protection(保护;防卫), protectionism(保护主义,贸易保护主义),protectionist(贸易保护主义者), protective(防护的;关切保护的;保护贸易的).
protectionism 保护主义protectionist 贸易保护论者protective 保护的
Trade has not been devastated the raft of protectionist actions taken during the downturn ., 贸易并没有因下滑期间采取的一系列保护主义行动而遭到严重破坏.

list.abs: China's commerce ministry said , in an unusually prompt and sharply worded response , the allegation was untrue and could encourage US protectionist sentiment .中国商务部迅速做出尖锐的、与常态不同的回应，称这种说法不实，并且可能助长美国的保护主义情绪。

protectionism 保护主义protectionist policy 保护政策provident fund scheme 公积金计划
商务培训网 ... Protectionism 贸易保护主义 Protectionist measures 保护主义措施 Protective Tariff 保护性关税.
protectionism 保护主义protectionist measure 贸易保护措施protectionist policy 保护主义政策

entry.def: A protectionist is someone who agrees with and supports protectionism.

example.ex: Trade frictions between the two countries had been caused by trade protectionists.
example.tran: 贸易保护主义者引起的两国之间的贸易摩擦。

entry.tran: （政策、措施、法律）贸易保护主义的
entry.def: Protectionist policies, measures, and laws are meant to stop or reduce imports.

example.ex: GATT member countries have largely agreed to replace expensive and inefficient protectionist policies with a competitive free market system for world trade.
example.tran: 关贸总协定的成员国已大体上同意在全球贸易中用竞争性的自由市场体制取代代价高且效率低的保护主义政策。

auth_sentence.content: The domestic manufacturers in Detroit want protectionist policies.
auth_sentence.res_content: The domestic manufacturers in Detroit want protectionist policies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The domestic manufacturers in Detroit want protectionist policies.

auth_sentence.content: So, in an election year... protectionist voices are on the rise again.
auth_sentence.res_content: So, in an election year... protectionist voices are on the rise again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So, in an election year... protectionist voices are on the rise again.

auth_sentence.content: I think a Republican Congress tends to be less protectionist than a Democratic Congress.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think a Republican Congress tends to be less protectionist than a Democratic Congress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think a Republican Congress tends to be less protectionist than a Democratic Congress.
